title: Question 4:
description: How can I cash out my Synth gains for ETH?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
You've probably either minted or bought sUSD, have been trading on Synthetix.Exchange, and now want to cash out into ETH. Here are your options:
1) Convert your synths profit to sUSD on synthetix.exchange
2) Convert that sUSD to ETH on 1inch.exchange (they will get you the best possible rate)

fields.title: For more details visit our help page:
